grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="1"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="660" height="900" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-1" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-1" value="grant ro accesses" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.start_2;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="272.5" y="15" width="55" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-3" value="" style="verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.arrows2.arrow;dy=0.72;dx=22;notch=0;rotation=-180;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="335" y="32.5" width="70" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-4" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Inputs</h1><p><span style="background-color: initial;">- region</span><br><span style="background-color: initial;">- cluster name</span><br><span style="background-color: initial;">- role aen</span><br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="415" y="25" width="100" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-8" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-13" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-7" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="270" y="455" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-5" value="verify requirements" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="120" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-10" value="CONFIG<br>MAP" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-7" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-9" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-12" value="API<div><br></div>" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-7" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-11" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-17" value="CONFIG MAP AND API" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-7" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-16" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-7" value="check authentication mode" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="245" y="470" width="110" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-9" value="update configmap" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="480" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-11" value="createAccessEntry" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="480" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-14" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-3" target="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-13" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="300" y="255" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="300" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-13" value="create kubernet permissions" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="315" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-16" value="TODO: work in progress" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="640" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-18" value="<i style="font-size: 10px;">implementation details:</i><div style="font-size: 10px;"><i style="font-size: 10px;">- creation of a ClusterRole called doit:view</i></div><div style="font-size: 10px;"><i style="font-size: 10px;">-&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 10px;">creation of a ClusterRole called ClusterRoleBinfingForDoit: it bound the ClusterRole doit:view to the group doit:viewers</span></i></div>" style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fontSize=10;fillColor=default;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="305" width="270" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="ccHAvJXeknlcyMZAPPWc-5" target="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="300" y="180" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="300" y="315" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GXhoRBtlUlCmQ_Oy1AWj-3" value="validate inputs" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="210" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
